name: AWS
description: AWS provides a comprehensive suite of cloud services that support scalable and flexible IT infrastructure.

name: Creative Force
description: Creative Force offers a content production platform that streamlines the workflow for creating digital assets.

name: Edgio
description: Edgio provides a content delivery network (CDN) that enhances website performance and security.

name: Fastly
description: Fastly offers an edge cloud platform that accelerates content delivery and improves site performance.

name: Google Cloud
description: Google Cloud offers cloud computing services that enable businesses to build, deploy, and scale applications efficiently.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB provides a NoSQL database solution that supports flexible and scalable data management.

name: Netlify
description: Netlify offers a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) that enables developers to deploy and manage modern web projects efficiently.

name: Vercel
description: Vercel provides a platform for frontend developers to deploy and scale web applications with ease.

name: Vultr
description: Vultr offers cloud compute and storage solutions that support scalable and cost-effective application deployment.

name: XTM
description: XTM provides a translation management system that helps businesses manage multilingual content efficiently.
